name: Taupi Taupe
description:
Taupi Taup

Taupi, he is the last emerald mole on Earth and he loves exploring! His life goal: reach the center of Earth.

However many obstacles are hidden in the soil… Can you help him dig its tunnels without getting hurt or stuck? He doesn’t like to follow direct orders, but he loves eating worms, wearing golden claws to cut through tree roots and diving with his snorkel…

Join his discrete bodyguard team so that he can still enjoy his passion of digging deeper and deeper while being safe. Share with the other bodyguards your deepest dive into our planet and see who is the best at his job. But first, start with your bodyguard training to be officially hired!

Controls
  • WASD: Move the tile selector
  • H: Place worm
  • J: Place Golden Claws
  • K: Place Snorkel
  • L: Fill tunnel with water
The Team
  • Lery: Master Coder
  • Moirai: Glorious sound and music
  • Nessou: Dr. Code
  • Nonon: Ms UI & Tutorial
  • The-devils-toaster: Fabulous artwork
  • Oune: The reason we took part in this madness
